requirements.text: The system shall support volunteer registration with configurable form fields.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster provides a web-based registration system with fully configurable form fields. It includes built-in validation for required and optional data points.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields and required/optional validation.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to create events and define shifts with capacity limits.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators have full control over event creation and shift management. The system enforces capacity limits for every defined shift.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits

requirements.text: The system shall allow volunteers to sign up for shifts and receive confirmations.
requirements.responseSummary: Volunteers can self-enroll in available shifts through the web interface. Automated email confirmations are sent immediately upon signup.
evidenceQuotes: volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.
Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported

requirements.text: The system shall send automated reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before a shift via email.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform supports automated email reminders with flexible scheduling. This includes the specific 24-hour and 2-hour intervals requested.
evidenceQuotes: Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h).

requirements.text: The system shall support optional SMS reminders (if enabled by the organization).
requirements.responseSummary: SMS reminders are supported via integration with third-party providers. The organization must provide their own SMS account to enable this feature.
evidenceQuotes: SMS reminders are not included by default; integration is possible via a third-party SMS provider if the organization supplies an account.
gapsOrQuestions: Does RapidRelief Network have a preferred SMS gateway provider?
Will the client manage the third-party SMS account billing directly?
riskFlags: Requires external integration and third-party account management.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to mark attendance and record no-shows.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can track attendance for every shift. The system specifically allows for marking no-shows and adding relevant notes.
evidenceQuotes: Attendance tracking is supported for each shift, including notes and no-show marking.

requirements.text: The system shall maintain a volunteer profile including languages, skills, certifications, and availability.
requirements.responseSummary: Comprehensive volunteer profiles are maintained within the system. These profiles track skills, language preferences, certifications, and availability notes.
evidenceQuotes: Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.

requirements.text: The system shall support role-based access (Admin, Coordinator, Volunteer).
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster utilizes role-based access control. It natively supports the Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles defined in the RFP.
evidenceQuotes: Role-based access is supported with Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a bilingual messaging option (English/Spanish) for templates.
requirements.responseSummary: The system supports bilingual communication. Messaging templates can be created in both English and Spanish for targeted outreach.
evidenceQuotes: Messaging templates can be authored in English and Spanish; coordinators can choose the template language per send.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a dashboard showing volunteer counts, shifts, attendance, and hours.
requirements.responseSummary: A centralized dashboard provides real-time visibility into volunteer metrics. This includes registration counts, fill rates, attendance, and total hours by event.
evidenceQuotes: Dashboards include volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance rate, and volunteer hours by event.

requirements.text: The system shall support CSV export of volunteer rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
requirements.responseSummary: Data portability is supported through CSV exports. Rosters, schedules, and logs can be exported for external reporting or analysis.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to broadcast announcements to selected volunteer segments.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators can send broadcast announcements to specific groups. Segmentation can be performed based on skills, location, or language preference.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can broadcast announcements to volunteer segments (by skill and language preference).

requirements.text: The system shall provide a basic audit log of coordinator actions.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform maintains an audit log of administrative actions. This includes tracking event creation, shift edits, and messaging history.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log (event creation/editing and message sends).

requirements.text: The system shall support data retention settings.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster includes configurable data retention rules. Organizations can define when inactive volunteer records should be purged.
evidenceQuotes: Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers (organization chooses retention period).

requirements.text: The system shall provide accessibility considerations for web UI.
requirements.responseSummary: The web interface is designed with accessibility in mind. It supports keyboard navigation for all primary workflows.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.

requirements.text: The platform shall be accessible via modern browsers on desktop and mobile.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform is a web-based solution compatible with modern browsers. It is specifically optimized for mobile browser access.

requirements.text: The platform shall support at least 2,000 registered volunteers.
requirements.responseSummary: The system is highly scalable. Standard deployments support up to 5,000 volunteers, exceeding the RFP requirement.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster is designed for organizations up to ~5,000 volunteers on standard deployment.

requirements.text: The platform shall provide basic error handling and clear user guidance.
requirements.responseSummary: While the system includes registration validation, specific documentation on general error handling and user guidance is not currently available in the brief.
gapsOrQuestions: Can you provide examples of system error messages and user guidance tooltips?
Is there a help center or knowledge base integrated into the UI?
riskFlags: Lack of explicit evidence for error handling standards.

requirements.text: The platform shall ensure that exported data can be downloaded without additional tools.
requirements.responseSummary: Data is exported in standard CSV format. This ensures compatibility with common spreadsheet software without requiring proprietary tools.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
